betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Time for some major study time!
Vis, apparently, as a field, has macroscopic effects that can only be observed between planets.
For some reason, creatures like the dragon living in the end islands can bend this field to cause large scale effects, like forming clouds of oxygen around the end islands.
The physics and magic behind this phenomenon are yet unknown to me, but it's time to change that.
The good thing about being trapped in an endless cycle of undeath is that I can spend more time studying without feeling like I'm wasting my time.
